page.title: 01 CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content:
SKIPPING There are an awful lot of rhymes or games that children play when skipping. Boys and girls both play skipping. Games may go on for up to 15 minutes. Two of the favourite rhymes are: KNICKER BOY I know a knicker boy, And he's double-jointed, Gave me a kiss and made me disappointed, Gave me another, To match the other, By gum(name) I'll tell your mother, For kissing (name) down by the river, How many kisses did you give him? 2,4,6,8, etc.(skipped quickly,peppers)
ONCE YOU'RE IN Once yuo're in you can't get out, Unless you touch the ground
